description_html:
Simple, clean lines loop across a field of tiny dots to create dynamic movement while blending effortlessly with other finishes. Cleanable, durable and beautiful, the Stinson Studio has designed Loophole to specifically address the high performance demands of today's healing environments. The scale of Loophole is at once unique and enticing bringing an aesthetic not traditionally found in coated fabrics.

Featured in 8 colorways

Bleach Cleanable

Exceeds 1,000,000 double rubs

GREENGUARD Certified
